title: Project scaffolding - Next.js + React Three Fiber
description:
Initialize Next.js 15+ with React Three Fiber and supporting packages.

## Commands
```bash
npx create-next-app@latest . --typescript --tailwind --app --src-dir
npm install three @react-three/fiber @react-three/drei @react-three/postprocessing
npm install gsap @gsap/react leva
npm install -D @types/three
npx shadcn@latest init
```

## Configure
- Add `transpilePackages: ['three']` to next.config.js
- Set up path aliases
close_reason: Scaffolded Next.js 15 with R3F, GSAP, and shadcn/ui. Build verified.

title: Performance optimization

- Texture compression and sizing
- Lazy load off-screen content
- useFrame optimization (avoid creating objects)
- Dispose geometries/materials on unmount
- Reduce draw calls

- Use Leva to toggle features for debugging
- Chrome DevTools Performance tab
- drei's `<PerformanceMonitor>`
